name: Sakurai Aviation
about: Sakurai Aviation Limited is Sri Lanka's premier flying school and domestic airline, regulated under the laws and regulations of Sri Lanka and operated under the guidelines of the Civil Aviation Authority of Sri Lanka. Established with the mission to instill and propagate the spirit of aviation, Sakurai Aviation has trained over 100 students since its inception in 2016. The school is committed to delivering high-quality services with a strong focus on safety and security. It offers a range of programs, including Private Pilot License (PPL), Commercial Pilot License (CPL), and Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL), combining theoretical knowledge with practical flight training. Sakurai Aviation also provides convenient payment plans and various study options, making it a leading choice for aspiring aviation professionals. With a dedication to continuous improvement, Sakurai Aviation ensures its students are industry-ready upon graduation.
